attributes.action: Stop holiday companies increasing prices for holidays during recognised school holidays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government want parents to stop taking children out of school to go on holiday, HOWEVER prices increase, sometimes by 50% or more during school holiday times.
Teachers and other people who work in school have got to pay the increased prices. How is this fair???

Please sign this petition to ask the government to investigate this issue and hopefully ensure that the prices of holidays is not increased unnecessarily because of school holidays.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
